price: Yoo [dhugaa] irraa gara galan,  Rabbiin beekaa balleessitootaati.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
